t: Bike Bleed Kits | BleedZone – BleedZone LLC
s: Best price and works just like the name brand version. Used it on a Reverb Stealth dropper and it worked like a charm. My seat post has been resurrected from the dead, praise Jesus! BTW, you need to purchase 2.5 wt fluid separately. However, if you have 5 wt suspension fluid lying around that works too. Isaac Watkins, May 2020 · Knew my mountain bike brakes were getting mushy and not right. Looked at a You Tube video and thought I would try to do this. Found this great kit on Amazon...

t: Amazon.com: BleedZone for Shimano Brakes Bleed Kit, Bike Hydraulic Brake Kit with 120ml Mineral Oil and Pro Syringe - Fits with Shimano Bike, Mountain Bike Brake Bleed Kit, Bicycle Brake Bleed Kit : Sports & Outdoors
s: BleedZone Kit for SHIMANO Hydraulic MTB Brakes. Includes all the essentials along with plenty of oil and a reusable syringe to bleed your brakes multiple times. Two-Year Warranty (see seller profile for more details). SHIMANO mineral oil has been repackaged into 120ml bottles. WARNING: only works with SHIMANO 2 piston mountain bike brakes that have a bleed port and is NOT compatible with Tektro, SRAM, Magura, or any other brand ...
